name: PuzzleDude
description:
Controls:                  [SPACE] Jump // [F] Dash
               click on the upper right of the screen to PAUSE the GAME

Game was made in 9 days and mainly for Android, but I wanted to share it on here too. Don't lynch me since I haven't optimized it for WebGL, because you can't see any of the actual HUD and some textures would just not be shown.

But the core gameplay mechanics do work and it still is fun tho :D
so good luck and try to have fun :)
